document.heading: Zoning - Sign Regulations - C-5-DC Zoning District - Amendment
An Ordinance Concerning Zoning - Sign Regulations - C-5-DC Zoning District - Amendment

text.em: : Additional Sign Standards are Located in Title 17 {"Signs"}.
